ViewPlaceform.12: Remember that the place you added will not be immediately visible on the map. First it has to be approved by the moderator. In case of an incorrect display of the help place on the map, don't worry, each location will be confirmed by the moderator.

Contact.2: Do you have a question? Have you noticed an error on the website? You can easily contact the website administrator using the form below:

LandingPage.1: Are you looking for a place where you can spend wonderful moments, meet new people, and at the same time help others? You've come to the right place! The 'Volunteering Map' will help you find what you are looking for. This completely free application allows you to find a foundation, hostel, retirement home or any other place where you are looking for volunteers. Check what facilities are located in your area. Perhaps creating an account on our portal will change your life ... Who knows, maybe you will meet friends here for years who will be your helping hand in more difficult times?
